mapper.sql: SELECT MEMBER_NO, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_PWD, ROLE, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_PHONE, MEMBER_GENRE, MEMBER_POINT, ENROLL_DATE, STATUS, MEMBER_DATE FROM MEMBER
mapper.select: SELECT MEMBER_NO, ROLE, MEMBER_ID, MEMBER_NAME, MEMBER_DATE, MEMBER_EMAIL, MEMBER_GENRE FROM MEMBER
mapper.sql: SELECT Q.QNA_NO, Q.QNA_TITLE, Q.QNA_CONTENT, Q.STATUS, Q.MEMBER_NO, Q.ANSWER_STATUS, Q.CREATE_DATE FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON(Q.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE Q.STATUS = 'Y'
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM QNA WHERE STATUS='Y'

SELECT Q.QNA_NO, Q.QNA_TITLE, Q.QNA_CONTENT, Q.STATUS, Q.MEMBER_NO, Q.ANSWER_STATUS, Q.CREATE_DATE, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON(Q.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE Q.STATUS = 'Y' ORDER BY Q.QNA_NO DESC

SELECT Q.QNA_NO, Q.QNA_TITLE, Q.QNA_CONTENT, Q.STATUS, Q.MEMBER_NO, Q.ANSWER_STATUS, Q.CREATE_DATE, M.MEMBER_NAME FROM QNA Q JOIN MEMBER M ON(Q.MEMBER_NO = M.MEMBER_NO) WHERE Q.STATUS = 'Y' AND QNA_NO = #{no}
mapper.update: UPDATE QNA SET STATUS = #{status} WHERE QNA_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO MOVIE_INFO ( MOVIE_NO, MEMBER_NO, MOVIE_TITLE, MOVIE_GENRE, MOVIE_RELEASE, MOVIE_DIRECTOR, MOVIE_CAST, MOVIE_RATING, MOVIE_TRAILER, MOVIE_POSTER, RENAMED_POSTER, MOVIE_STATUS, IMG, RENAMED_IMG, MOVIE_SUMMARY, PRICE, READCOUNT, MOVIE_COMMENT, MOVIE_GRADE, CREATE_DATE ) VALUES( SEQ_MOVIE_INFO_NO.NEXTVAL, #{memberNo}, #{movieTitle}, #{movieGenre}, #{movieRelease}, #{movieDirector}, #{movieCast}, #{movieRating}, #{movieTrailer}, #{moviePoster}, #{renamedPoster}, DEFAULT, #{img}, #{renamedImg}, #{movieSummary}, #{price}, DEFAULT, #{movieComment}, #{movieGrade}, DEFAULT )
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS='Y'
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, NOTICE_IMG, RENAMED_IMG, STATUS, MEMBER_NO FROM NOTICE
SELECT NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, NOTICE_IMG, RENAMED_IMG, STATUS, MEMBER_NO FROM NOTICE WHERE STATUS = 'Y' AND NOTICE_NO = #{no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO NOTICE ( NOTICE_NO, NOTICE_TITLE, NOTICE_CONTENT, CREATE_DATE, NOTICE_IMG, RENAMED_IMG, STATUS, MEMBER_NO ) VALUES( SEQ_NOTICE_NO.NEXTVAL, #{title}, #{content}, DEFAULT, #{noticeImg}, #{renamedImg}, DEFAULT, #{memberNo} )
